item.title: CrimethInc. Coming to Your Town. Maybe.
item.content_encoded:
An enthusiastic and delightful circus of outlaw engineers and charming maniacs are going on a nation-wide tour traveling from the Pacific Northwest across the country, down the East Coast and ending up at the 6th annual CrimethInc. Convergence—and they need your help to make it happen (see below). A dissected and rewired bus, resurrected by Winona Minnesota's faction of the CrimethInc. Madass Scientists Guild will be converted into running on vegetable oil. Literally living off the fat of the land, this unstoppable veggie-oil guzzlin' task force could be headed your way. The purpose of this tour is to stimulate the magic and intimacy already present in the communities we plan on visiting. Froseph, the newest addition to the CrimethInc. music library, will play a set of songs, including many off “Deep Breath,” his forthcoming album. This project was painstakingly recorded and mixed in a hidden Salem dungeon by Froseph himself, harmonizing obscure vocal stylings with a hearty assortment of instrumental tactics. Having a reputation of screechy politically charged novelty songs, Froseph takes a different, more serious approach with the songs on “Deep Breath,” dealing mostly with sexual abuse, lonliness, civilization, and the denial of those repressions. Aside from a Froseph set, and in an effort to eliminate the predictable and all too comfortable performer/audience dynamic, this tour will try to encourage participation on many levels: exciting and intimate community-building exercises and games exchanging awkwardness for empowerment and a variety of workshops—including a workshop on transforming vehicles into running on vegetable oil—to be hosted by our troupe of craftsfolk and any locals brave enough to come out of the woodwork to share skills they have. The usual CrimethInc. literature will be available accompanied by harder-to-find arts-and-crafts projects, cds, shirts, patches and zines. Although a tour name has not been decided on, a tentative itinerary has been pulled together and it looks like we'll be in these areas around these dates:
  • June 1st-Salem, OR
  • June 2nd & 3rd-Astoria, OR
  • June 4th & 5th-Olympia, WA
  • June 6th & 7th-Butte, MT
  • June 8th & 9th-Fargo, ND
  • June 10th-Bemidji, MN
  • June 11th-Brainard, MN
  • June 12th, 13th, & 14th-Winona, MN
  • June 15th & 16th-Decorah, IA
  • June 17th & 18th-Buffalo, NY
  • June 19th & 20th-Boston, MA area
  • June 21st & 22nd-New York, NY area
  • June 23rd & 24th-Easton, PA
  • June 25th & 26th-Philadelphia, PA area
  • June 27th & 28th-Washington DC area
  • June 29th & 30th-Virginia tba
  • July 1st & 2nd-Carrboro, NC
  • July 3rd & 4th-Greensboro, NC
  • July 5th-25th-Between Greensboro and Athens tba (a.k.a. help!)
  • July 25th-29th-Athens OH
    • Nothing is confirmed, as of this post. If you or anyone in your community is interested in helping throw this event in your town, please email me [froseph@crimethinc.com] and we'll work out the details. We're pretty portable and low maintenance. We need a venue (lodge/park/infoshop/basement/etc) and promotional help. Also, if you live around these areas and would like us to come to your town, let us know. To see what Froseph is all about, visit www.myspace.com/twinklepig We really hope you're as excited about this as we are. Together we can work magic. In Danger, the CrimethInc. Board of Insurrectors

wp_comment.wp_comment_content: If you can, it would be awesome if you would be able to visit our infoshop in Milwaukee.
I'd really love to get out there for one of those. Too bad I'm all the way in Utah... hey sometime you should think about heading out this direction.
Yea comin to milwaukee would be great btw pika what infoshop? U mean the one that's about to open up right?
Pika-please email me (froseph@crimethinc.com) regarding Milwaukee. Perhaps June 15th and/or 16th could be there. Let's talk.
so, does this mean it's safe to assume the CI Convergence will be July 25th-29th in Athens, OH ? That's perfect.

A small gang of riff raff, adventurers and crazies are gonna do another great lakes tour but bigger, better and pre-planned this time. It's gonna run 2 weeks from July 10th-July 24th possibly starting in Kalamazoo, we're looking for dates in the areas around or in Milwaukee, Des Moines, Kalamazoo, Chicago, Indiana, Madison and anywhere in between, we would actually prefer smallish towns where less goes on so bring us to your suburbs and quiet communities as well as your big cities and college towns. Also, we're still looking for a van or other vehicles so if you know anything about that, please get at us. To bring puppet shows, poets and pandemonium to your neck of the woods, or bring along your project or performance (poetry, fire spinning, a strange invention, musical performance, social engineering, puppet show, dance, workshop, etc.) on the road with us, holler at goldencalfparty@hotmail.com

If you need a place between Athens and Greensboro, we can help you out in Charleston or Myrtle Beach. Though I think it might be a bit out of your way.
Let us know, dvac@riseup.net

So hows a gathering in Milwaukee looking? If you guys need anything on your way though Chicago, let me know, I'm between there and Aurora in Naperville... west suburbs.. It would be great to host something here. It's just about the most complacent town around... lots of opportunity to flip some squares.
So Fro, you're NOT coming through Minneapolis?
Actually it looks like Minneapolis is possible for June 11th-right after Brainerd, MN and before Winona. i'm in contact with someone who wants it to be at the Jack Pine Community Center.
You ought to come to Cincinnati on your way to Athens. I know some people in Columbus that would probably host you as well.

Here is the updated itinerary.
If there are questions regarding a specific show, please contact the person whose email address is posted first. If you have other questions, write to: froseph@crimethinc.com
June 1st-Salem, OR High Street House 2852 High St. SE 7pm Tour Kickoff/Farewell Casandra & Froseph/"Deep Breath" CD Release Party cjohns@willamette.edu
June 2nd & 3rd-Olympia, WA unconfirmed
June 4th-Tacoma, WA Fife House 714 S Fife St. 6:30pm with Onyx of Olympia, Flesh in the Panties, Mark Gunnery, and Blood Lust Distro joshua86@hotmail.com
June 5th-Spokane, WA Couer d'Alene Park 2nd and Chestnut 6pm piggknuckle@yahoo.com
June 6th-Missoula, MT Higgins Hall 617 S Higgins 7pm with Lemuria & The Ergs tummyrock@yahoo.com
June 7th-Butte, MT Venus Rising Espresso House 6-9pm 124 S Main St. Shawn: 406-491-6608
June 8th-Dunn Center, ND spend the night at Sandman's? (no show)
June 9th-Fargo, ND unconfirmed
June 10th-Brainerd, MN Sasquatches House 608 9th St. N 5pm with Bill Cosby Murder Project & more Georgewchrist@hushmail.com
June 11th-Minneapolis, MN Jack Pine Community Center 2815 E Lake Street 6pm with Two Wheels and a Heart alexk@riseup.net
June 12th, 13th & 14th-Winona, MN June 12th: Latsch Island Noon with networkofterror, The Knotwells, The Blackthorns, Eatin' Hog Eye, Mike Bird, & Megan Nelson froseph@crimethinc.com
June 15th &16th-Milwaukee, WI June 15th: Cream City Collectives 732 E Clarke St. 7pm unmatchableman@hotmail.com
June 17th-Fort Wayne, IN Friman's Square 6pm with the Shithouse Boys doctorsnikt@yahoo.com
June 18th-Buffalo, NY Bird House-92 Bird Ave. 7pm
June 20th-Rochester, NY Sisters of Libertalia House 250 Hamilton St. 5:30pm Limphry@truepunk.com
June 21st-Sussex, NJ A Special Paviliion 915 Route 23 3pm with Jugging Workshop, Self-Defense/Rape Prevention Workshop, a local distro, and Shoelacetown Anarchist Black Cross commiesinmycloset@hotmail.com
June 23rd-Easton, PA Riverside Park with Whiskey Smile, Slug's Revenge, and Mark Leonard Noon Rectal_Disembowelment@yahoo.com
June 25th-Philadelphia, PA unconfirmed myspace.com/witness
June 27th Washington DC unconfirmed muthatrucka@gmail.com
July 3rd Greensboro, NC unconfirmed
July 8th-Durham, NC Marvelleventcenter 119 W Main Street 9:30pm marvellalliance@aol.com
July 10th-Greenville, NC Spazzatorium Galleria 7pm with MC Homeless, In Black & White, and Lost Hands Found Fingers mchomeless@hotmail.com
July 21st-Lexington, KY Vegas House 6pm with amazing local acoustic musicians... yoshomon(at)yahoo.com
July 25th-29th-Athens, OH (CrimethInc. Convergence)
July 30th-Yellow Brick Road to Winona

This sad news just in: This tour is officially canceled. This tour wasn't canceled because it was too hard and we just didn't feel like putting in all the extra work. This tour was canceled because, as it was planned, it was impossible. A lot has happened and we've learned a ton, but more-or-less following through with the first week of this tour has shown us it simply isn't sustainable. My friend and I are planning on hitchhiking with our packs and guitar from Missoula (where we are now, on June 9th) to Winona, MN and possibly making it to some of the shows we had scheduled (perhaps very late). Me and her are still planning on attending the Convergence in Athens. If you need to know more about details, you can email me. I'm sincerely sorry to everyone who has put in their energy to put on this show in their town. I hope those shows can still go on without us.
Still no regrets, -Froseph
